column1: The username or password you entered was not correct.

column1: Your password has been reset for security and sent to your email address
column2: La tua password è stata azzerata per sicurezza ed è stata inviata al tuo indirizzo di posta elettronica

column1: Sorry, there was an error sending you your updated password. Please contact us for more help.
column2: Spiacenti, c'è stato un errore nell'invio della nuova password. Si prega di contattarci per ulteriore aiuto

column1: Sorry, we could not locate your account. Please contact us to resolve this issue.
column2: Spiacenti, non riusciamo a trovare il tuo account. Contattaci per risolvere il problema.

column1: Digitalus CMS gives You the possibilty to use Your existing OpenID to login to the administrator area.
If you are having trouble logging in please enter your email address below and we will send you your login credentials.
column2: Se hai problemi ad eseguire l'accesso inserisci il tuo indirizzo di posta e ti manderemo i tuoi dati d'accesso

column1: Please enter your username (this is your email address) and password to get started.
column2: Si prega di inserire il nome utente (è il vostro indirizzo e-mail)

column1: Return to the standard login using Your username and password.

column1: For help installing Digitalus CMS check out our site
The following tasks were successfully completed:
The following items are not quite right, and should be fixed at some point:
The following errors have occurred, and will need to be fixed prior to installation:
Your server is properly configured to host the Digitalus CMS efficiently and securely!

Digitalus CMS uses your email address as the username for the CMS, because it is unique and easy to remember. You can enter what ever you like for a password, but bear in mind that your site is only as secure as this password!
Now you need to set up the database connection. If you are unsure about this contact your hosting provider.
Please double check all of the information on this page. If everything looks right then click Install Now to install Digitalus CMS
Digitalus CMS was successfully installed on your domain.
Before you use it you must completely delete the install folder, as in this screenshot:
Once that folder is deleted Digitalus will automatically load when you visit this domain.
